content: How are YOU celebrating the Coronation? Send your pictures and videos to pictures@mailonline.co.uk CORONATION LIVEBLOG: Click here to follow live updates throughout today As King Charles III and Queen Camilla are crowned in a ceremony full of the pomp and pageantry long-associated with royal occasions, celebrations are under way across the UK and the world.

Today marks the first coronation of a British monarch in 70 years and an estimated two million people have taken to the streets of central London to watch history unfold. Meanwhile, communities are holding street parties, gun salutes and other special commemorative events to mark the historic occasion.As the eyes of the world are fixed on King Charles and Queen Camilla, MailOnline charts how the world celebrated one of Britain's most historic day
